Class TransitionSection

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.actoriac.report.TransitionSection
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportSection
public class TransitionSection extends Object implements ReportSection
Report section for state transition summary.

Displays a list of transitions with success/failure status and a summary count.

Since:
2.15.0
Author:
devteam@scivicslab.com

  • Method Details

    • addTransition

      public void addTransition(String transition, boolean success, String errorMessage)
      Adds a transition entry.
      Parameters:
      transition - the transition description (e.g., "0 -> 1")
      success - true if the transition succeeded
      errorMessage - the error message if failed (may be null)

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Description copied from interface: ReportSection
      Returns the section title.

      If null or empty, the section content is output without a title line.

      Specified by:
      getTitle in interface ReportSection
      Returns:
      the section title, or null for no title

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      Description copied from interface: ReportSection
      Returns the section content.

      If null or empty, the section is skipped in the report.

      Specified by:
      getContent in interface ReportSection
      Returns:
      the section content

    • getOrder

      public int getOrder()
      Description copied from interface: ReportSection
      Returns the display order.

      Sections with lower order values are displayed first. Recommended values:

      • 100 - Workflow info (header area)
      • 200 - Check results (% messages)
      • 300 - Transitions
      • 400 - Collected data (JsonState)
      Specified by:
      getOrder in interface ReportSection
      Returns:
      the order value
